page.title: 11MEDIA
page.content: {RADIO, PRINTED, T.V. { {RADIO :}WE ARE SERVED BY NATIONAL RADIO(BBC) AND TWO LOCAL INDEPENDENT STATIONS.80% OF BROADCASTING IS POPULAR MUSIC,THE REST BEING NEWS, CURRENT AFFAIRS, ETC. FEW PEOPLE LISTEN TO "SERIOUS" PROGRAMMES (PLAYS, STORIES, CLASSICAL MUSIC). {PRINTED :}WE HAVE THREE WEEKLY NEWSPAPERS, ONE LOCAL TO THE TOWN, THE OTHERS REGIONAL, ONE OF THESE BEING DISTRIBUTED FREE.MOST OF THE NATIONAL DAILY/SUNDAY PAPERS ARE AVAILABLE AS ARE MOST CURRENT MAGAZINES, BOOKS, ETC. {T.V :}VIRTUALLY ALL HOUSEHOLDS HAVE ONE OR MORE T.V SETS(33% TELETEXT EQUIPPED).VIDEOS ARE BECOMING INCREASINGLY COMMON WITH TWO THIRDS OF ALL FAMILIES USING ONE.SOAP OPERAS ARE THE MOST POPULAR PROGRAMMES.
